segment.source: How to Install and Configure the App-V Management Console for a More Secure Environment
segment.target: How to Install and Configure the App-V Management Console for a More Secure Environment

segment.source: How to Install and Configure the App-V Management Console for a More Secure Environment
segment.target: How to Install and Configure the App-V Management Console for a More Secure Environment

segment.source: How to Install and Configure the App-V Management Console for a More Secure Environment
segment.target: How to Install and Configure the App-V Management Console for a More Secure Environment

segment.source: The default installation of the App-V Management Console includes support for secure communications.
segment.target: The default installation of the App-V Management Console includes support for secure communications.

segment.source: Each Management Console is configured on a per-connection basis when the console is started for the first time or when connecting to an additional App-V Web Management Service.
segment.target: Each Management Console is configured on a per-connection basis when the console is started for the first time or when connecting to an additional App-V Web Management Service.

segment.source: The default configuration uses SSL over TCP port 443.
segment.target: The default configuration uses SSL over TCP port 443.

segment.source: You can change the port number if the port number was modified on the server.
segment.target: You can change the port number if the port number was modified on the server.

segment.source: You can use the following procedure to connect to an App-V Web Management Service by using a secure connection.
segment.target: You can use the following procedure to connect to an App-V Web Management Service by using a secure connection.

segment.source: How to Connect to an App-V Management Service by Using an SSL Connection
segment.target: How to Connect to an App-V Management Service by Using an SSL Connection

segment.source: Start the Application Virtualization Management Console.
segment.target: Start the Application Virtualization Management Console.

segment.source: Click Configure Connection in the actions pane of the console.
segment.target: Click Configure Connection in the actions pane of the console.

segment.source: Type the Web Service Host Name, and ensure that Use Secure Connection is selected.
segment.target: Type the Web Service Host Name, and ensure that Use Secure Connection is selected.

segment.source: The name provided in the Web Service Host Name must match the common name on the certificate, or the connection will fail.
segment.target: The name provided in the Web Service Host Name must match the common name on the certificate, or the connection will fail.

segment.source: Select the appropriate login credentials, and click OK.
segment.target: Select the appropriate login credentials, and click OK.

segment.source: Configuring Certificates to Support the App-V Web Management Service
segment.target: Configuring Certificates to Support the App-V Web Management Service
